casebody.data:
NEUSOFT MEDICAL SYSTEM COMPANY, LTD., et al., petitioners,
v.
NEUISYS, LLC. No. 15-1121. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 3, 2016.

Motion of North Carolina Association of Defense Attorneys for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of North Carolina denied.
